title: Google assistant doesn't recognise songs
content:
Hello! 
I have a problem with assistant in Pixel 2 xl. It doesn't recognize songs, only the grey strips appear and nothing happens. Now playing is working, and google app also (when you hit mic symbol, and note symbol) the only problem is with assistant. I wll be greatful if anyone help help me fix it :(
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 2
